CreateLearnerAccountForm.header: Bar kowa ya ƙirƙiro nasu shafin na koyo?
CreateLearnerAccountForm.noOptionLabel: A'a. Dole ne masu gudanarwa su ƙirƙiro dukkan shafukan
DefaultLanguageForm.languageFormHeader: A taimaka a zaɓi asalin harshen Kolibri
DeviceNameForm.deviceNameExplanation: Bawa wannan naurar suna mai ma'ana na iya taimaka maka da sauran da kuke haɗuwa da gano shi
ErrorPage.errorPageAdditionalGuidance: Idan sake gwadawar bata yi aiki ba, sake kunna rumbun ajiyar kuma sabunta shafin.
ErrorPage.errorPageHeader: Wani abu bai yi daidai ba
ErrorPage.errorPageSubheader: A taimaka a duba sabis na rumbun ajiya sannan a sake gwadawa.
FacilityNameTextbox.facilityNameFieldEmp: Cibiyar baza ta iya kasance babu komai ba
FacilityNameTextbox.facilityNameFieldMax: Sunan cibiya ba zai iya zama fiye da harufa hamsin 50 ba
FacilityPermissionsForm.facilityPermissi: Cibiya shine wurin da zaka saka Kolibri, kamar wani makaranta, cibiyar horo, ko wani gida
FacilityPermissionsForm.formalDescriptio: Makarantu da sauran yanayin koyo da hukuma ta amince dasu
FacilityPermissionsForm.learningEnvironm: Wani irin wurin koyo ne cibiyar ka yake?
FacilityPermissionsForm.nonFormalDescrip: Laburare, gidajen marayu, cibiyoyin sauya hali, cibiyoyin matasa, dakin koyon kwamfuta, da wasu yanayin koyo daban mara tsari
GettingStartedForm.advancedSetupDescript: Don makarantu, shirye-shiryen ilimi, ƙungiyoyi, ko wasu saitunan koyo na gungun wanda zasu amfani da Kolibri tare
GettingStartedForm.quickStartDescription: Don koyarwa a gida, ƙarfafa ilimin wani, da wani amfani daban na kai
GettingStartedFormAlt.descriptionParagra: A Kolibri, kana iya amfani da cibiya don gudanar da wani gungun masu amfani wanda suke da girma, kamar makaranta, wani shirin ilimi ko kowane saitin koyo daban. Kuma kana iya samun cibiyoyi da yawa akan na'ura guda.
Shin zaka so ka shirya wani cibiya?
GettingStartedFormAlt.gettingStartedHead: Yaya ka ke so kayi amfani da Kolibri?
GuestAccessForm.description: Wannan yana barin kowa ya duba kayyayakin dake kan Kolibri ba tare da buƙatar samun shafi
GuestAccessForm.noOptionLabel: A'a. Dole masu amfani dashi su samu shafi don duba kayyayakin dake Kolibri
ImportFacilitySetup.stepTitle: Shigo da cibiya - {step, number} na {total, number}
ImportIndividualUserForm.deviceLimitatio: ’{full_name} ({username})’ shine {roles} akan ‘{device}’. Wannan na'urar yana bada dama ga masu koyo kawai. Ba za'a samu damar abubuwa na malamai da masu gudanarwa.
ImportIndividualUserForm.doNotHaveUserCr: Babu bayanai shaida a matsayin mai amfani?
ImportIndividualUserForm.enterAdminCrede: Shigar da sunan mai amfani da kalmar sirri na mai gudanar da cibiya ko kuma babban mai gudanarwa na '{facility}'
ImportIndividualUserForm.enterCredential: Shigar da bayanai shaida na shafin mai amfani da ka ke so ka shigo dashi
ImportIndividualUserForm.headerAdmin: Yi amfani da shafin mai gudanarwa
ImportIndividualUserForm.importIndividua: Shigo da shafukan masu amfani na ɗai-ɗaikun mutane
ImportIndividualUserForm.useAdmin: Yi amfani da wani shafin mai gudanarwa
ImportLODUsersSetup.stepTitle: Shigo da shafukan masu amfani na ɗai-ɗaikun mutane - {step, number} na {total, number}
LoadingPage.loadingPageSubheader: A yi hakuri. Tsarawa zai iya ɗaukan wasu mintuna
PersonalDataConsentForm.description: Idan kana shirya Kolibri don wasu suyi amfani dashi, kai ko wanda ka zaɓa zai zama da alhakin kare da gudanar da shafukan masu amfani da bayanai kai da aka adana a wannan na'urar.
PersonalSetup.adminAccountCreationDescri: Wannan shafin na barin ka gudanar da duk abubuwa da shafukan masu amfani akan wannan na'urar
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.header: Bada damar kalmomin sirri akan shafukan masu koyo?
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionL: A'a. Sai dai masu koyon su amfani da suna kawai wajen shiga
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionT: Zai taimakawa masu koyon da basu girma ba ko idan ba ka da damuwa game da tsaron shafin
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.accountFacil: Wannan shafin zai samu alaƙa da cibiyar '{facility}'
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.chooseAdminP: Zaɓi wani mai gudanarwa daga '{facility}' ko samar da babban mai gudanarwa.
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.description: Wannan shafin na barin ka sarrafa kayyayaki, albarkatu, da shafukan masu amfani akan wannan na'urar.
SetupMethod.descriptionImportLOD: Wannan na'urar na iya hadi da wani cikkaken na'ura da kanshi wanda yake da cibiya iri daya
SetupMethod.descriptionParagraph1: Cibiya yana nufin wurin da zaka saka Kolibri, kamar wani makaranta, cibiyar horo, ko wani gida.
SetupMethod.fullDeviceTooltip: Na'urar za ta dauki sabar Kolibri da masu gudanarwa, malamai da masu koyo ke amfani da ita
SetupMethod.importFacilityAction: Shigo da duk bayanin daga wani cibiyar da dama akwai
SetupMethod.importLOD: Shigo da shafin mai amfani ɗaya ko fiye daga wani cibiyar da dama akwai
SetupMethod.initializeDevice: Zaɓa tsarin cibiyar don wannan na'urar
SetupMethod.lodTooltip: Na'urar za ta dauki Siffofin Kolibri don dalibai, amma ba malamai da masu gudanarwa ba
SuperuserCredentialsForm.adminAccountCre: Wannan shafin na barin ka gudanar da cibiyar, kayyayaki, da shafukan masu amfani akan wannan na'urar
SuperuserCredentialsForm.rememberThisAcc: Da mahimmanci: a tuna ɗan Allah da wannan bayanin shafin. Rubuta shi idan ana buƙatar haka
YesNoForm.details: Zaka iya canza wannan a cikin saitin cibiyar ka daga baya
